def transform(sequence):
    first_digit = sequence[0]
    last_digits = sequence[1:]
    transformed_sequence = last_digits.replace(first_digit, '', 1)
    transformed_sequence = first_digit + transformed_sequence + first_digit
    return transformed_sequence

the original sequence "00166000000" is transformed into "00661000000", the original sequence "00003777700" is transformed into "00007777300", the original sequence "56600000000" is transformed into "66500000000"

def transform(sequence):
    first_digit = sequence[0]
    last_digits = sequence[1:]
    transformed_sequence = last_digits.replace(first_digit, '', 1)
    transformed_sequence = first_digit + transformed_sequence + first_digit
    return transformed_sequence
